Others: Memphis Grizzlies are coping with key injuries, particularly those of Ja Morant and Zach Edey.
The team is also dealing with turnovers, which have led to a season-high 33 points off turnovers in a recent game against the Oklahoma City Thunder.
Without Morant and Edey, the Grizzlies suffered a 130-106 loss to the Thunder on December 29, 2024.
The Grizzlies are relying more on their depth due to the injuries, with players like Cam Spencer, Yuki Kawamura, and Colin Castleton being activated and recalled.
The team's upcoming games include a matchup against the Suns on December 31, 2024, followed by games against the Kings and Warriors.
Coaches and players acknowledge the need to improve ball security and adapt to the current challenges.
